scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebookBackend
scripts.deploy: cd ../../ && git branch -D feature_deploy && git subtree split  --prefix part3/phonebookBackend -b feature_deploy && git push heroku feature_deploy:master --force
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
